alert.note: Alert for Western Grant (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 3:51AM EST until December 30 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett County. In West Virginia, Western Grant County. * WHEN...The bulk of the snow accumulation will occur through 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest accumulations will be in western Garrett County and far western Grant County.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
